data.meta_description: Savage Henry Films is a Houston based video & film production company, filming commercials, corporate video, narrative films, and documentaries.
data.text:
Savage Henry Films is a full service video production company based in Houston, TX.

Need to hire a Texas based production company?

Do you have a project shooting in Texas and need to hire a bad ass production crew? Give Savage Henry Films a call. Whether you need an entire creative project developed from scratch, need below the line crew and rentals for a project about to go into production, or even just a local fixer to help navigate a fast moving documentary project. Savage Henry Films is here to help.

From the inception of your idea, to the "martini-shot" on set, we will help execute your vision. Savage Henry Films can scale our productions to fit within any budgetary goal, whether your project has a multi-million dollar budget...or a bit less. We will ensure that your money remains "on-screen".

Savage Henry Films pride ourselves on working closely with our clients to deliver on-time, on-budget, while exceeding their expectations with cutting edge visual media.

What We Do:

We produce, shoot, and provide post-production video services for broadcast, branded content for social media, and corporate video for internal or external facing comms. We also offer equipment rentals, and crewing services for productions in Texas and beyond.
